info.name: DuckDuckNord
info.description: basic nord theme for duckduckgo, source code is on https://github.com/Not-a-web-Developer/nord-stylesheets along with everything else i'll do
info.additionalInfo: release version 0.0.2 (obviously still alpha and incomplete), fixed some text and header in the search results page; also now has better coverage of buttons when you hover over them.
